Name: Remove tkn mngr + trace unit
Description: remove code related to token manager ref model and trace unit, if exists

Name: remove Sideband Fabric Sel
Description: The sideband signal doesn't exist in design anymore and should be deleted

Name: token manager
Description: token manager ref model should be replaced by some token generation. Similar mechanisms exist in other blocks so copying should be possible.

Name: Register Access Layer
Description: Run register tests on IFD ODR Trace Unit and Token Manager CSR's.

Name: Clock and Reset
Description: All tests will run at prescribed clock frequency (800 MHz). Do random reset timing when all IFD ODR and Token Manager are active.

Name: MVM_IFD0
Description: Verify Instance of MVM IFD0 by testing all req_id related to IFD.

Name: MVM_IFD1
Description: Verify Instance of MVM IFD1 by testing all req_id related to IFD.

Name: MVM_IFD2
Description: Verify Instance of MVM IFD2 by testing all req_id related to IFD.

Name: MVM_IFDW
Description: Verify Instance of MVM IFDW by testing all req_id related to IFD.

Name: DWPU_IFD0
Description: Verify Instance of DWPU IFD0 by testing all req_id related to IFD.

Name: DWPU_IFD1
Description: Verify Instance of DWPU IFD1 by testing all req_id related to IFD.

Name: MVM_ODR
Description: Verify Instance of MVM ODR by testing all req_id related to ODR.

Name: DWPU_ODR
Description: Verify Instance of DWPU ODR by testing all req_id related to ODR.

Name: L1
Description: Verify Instance of L1 by testing all req_id related to L1.

Name: Interrupts
Description: Cover all the interrupt conditions for each sub-block.
Source: ALL IRQ or Error tests in each LS sub block. DMC_L1_irq_cg
Coverpoints if applicable: cp_irq [MVM_IFD0 MVM_IFD1 MVM_IFD2 MVM_IFDW MVM_ODR DWPU_IFD0 DWPU_IFD1 DWPU_ODR TOKEN_MGR]

Name: Sideband CID
Description: Drive sideband CID signal via virtual interface. Verify by accessing L1.

Name: Sideband PMU Signals
Description: PMU Signals will be driven according to the boot-up sequence. Any test using L1 indirectly verifies proper boot-up.  PMU signals are tested in AI Core top level.
Coverpoints if applicable: cp_light_sleep [ENABLED DISABLED] cp_deep_sleep [ENABLED DISABLED] cp_shutdown [ENABLED DISABLED]

Name: Address Space
Description: The address space for each IFD ODR are tested by accessing address boundaries.

Name: Linear Address Pattern
Description: Generate pattern of 1x1x1 size for ABC dimensions.

Name: Non Linear Address Pattern
Description: Generate non-linear address pattern based randomized address generator parameters.

Name: Clock Gating
Description: Test Clock Gating Enable. Gate and resume the clock randomly during operation.
